item.title: Katy add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Katy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Nora Roberts is cool." -- Stephen King

item.title: Katy add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "You can fix anything but a blank page." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Katy add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "I was dead until you found me, though I breathed. I was sightless, though I could see. And then you came...and I was awakened." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Katy add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Katy add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "Actually, since I'm gay I think I should count for two guys instead of just one. I mean, in me you get the male point of view and you don't have to worry about me wanting to touch your boobies." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Katy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Katy add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Katy add a quote by Scott Westerfield
item.description: "The human heart is a strange vessel. Love and hatred can exist side by side." -- Scott Westerfield

item.title: Katy add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "You see, freedom has a way of destroying things." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Katy add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "You can smile when your heart is breaking because you're a woman." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Katy add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "The world hasn't changed that much; men still rule." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Katy add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "For Harry Potter I have all the time in the world." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Katy add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "If it means something, take it to heart. If it means nothing, it's nothing. Let it go." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Katy add a quote by Arthur Golden
item.description: "Water is powerful. It can wash away earth, put out fire, and even destroy iron." -- Arthur Golden

item.title: Katy add a quote by Bram Stoker
item.description: "We learn from failure, not from success!" -- Bram Stoker

item.title: Katy add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Katy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Katy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Katy add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I am coming to terms with the fact that loving someone requires a leap of faith, and that a soft landing is never guaranteed." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There comes a time in every life when the world gets quiet and the only thing left is your heart." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Because this is what happens when you try to run from the past. It just doesn’t catch up, it overtakes … blotting out the future." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Wherever you will go, I will let you down, But this lullaby goes on." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It was like when you're a little kid and you run into your teacher or librarian at the grocery store or Wal-mart and it's just so startling, because it never occurred to you they existed outside of school." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Katy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Hate Spinnerbait!" -- Sarah Dessen
